      </title>

    <item>
      <title>
	DR MAX THE MIND DOCTOR
      </title>
      <link>
	http://www.dailymail.co.uk/health/article-5402279/DR-MAX-MIND-DOCTOR.html?ITO=1490&ns_mchannel=rss&ns_campaign=1490
      </link>
      <description>
	When we see another human being in distress, it’s only natural to comfort them. It doesn’t matter if you’re a doctor or a dustman, the instinct to touch and console is overwhelming.
      </description>
      <enclosure url="http://i.dailymail.co.uk/i/pix/2018/02/17/01/494D5FB200000578-0-image-a-6_1518829252017.jpg" type="image/jpeg" length="5939"/>
      <pubDate>Sat, 17 Feb 2018 01:05:29 +0000</pubDate>
      <guid>
	http://www.dailymail.co.uk/health/article-5402279/DR-MAX-MIND-DOCTOR.html?ITO=1490&ns_mchannel=rss&ns_campaign=1490
